title: New: Mmoths – Folding
body: With his **Vacationer** remix going down an [absolute treat](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/16881-new-vacationer-trip-mmoths-remix/), Irish beatmaker prodigy **Mmoths** has dropped a new track in the form of the vibrant _Folding_. Rolling synths and handclaps throughout, it’s a marked progression from previous work, yet still centred around a pivotal hook. With Jack about to embark on a full US tour, it’s exciting times for **Mmoths**.
